column1: #Text=2 ion exchanged water 400 g silver sulfate (as silver) 1 g
#Text=[0138] This solution (1-c) was directly used as a solution for providing a catalyst for electroless copper plating.

#Text=[0139] After an ABS resin sample subjected to pretreatments, i.e., etching and conditioning, in accordance with a conventional method was immersed in the solution (1-c) for 5 minutes, the sample was rinsed with water and then immersed in the following solution (1-d) containing a reducing agent for 3 minutes.
#Text=Then, the sample was rinsed with water and then immersed in an electroless copper plating solution (1-e).
